definitions.definition: A thin layer of some substance; a pellicle; a membranous covering, causing opacity.
definitions.example: a clear plastic film for wrapping food

definitions.definition: A medium used to capture images in a camera.
A slender thread, such as that of a cobweb.
To record (activity, or a motion picture) on photographic film.
definitions.example: A Hollywood studio was filming on location in NYC.

definitions.definition: To cover or become covered with a thin skin or pellicle.
